---
title: "Replace Missing Values in Objects"
---

*R/na_actions.R*

## na.replace

## Description
This S3 generic provides an interface for replacing `NA` values within an object. 


## Usage
```r
na.replace(object, ...) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| object | An `R` object. |
| ... | Arguments passed along to implementing methods. |
